description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国人民保险公司董事长兼总经理。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, former Chairman and General Manager of the People's Insurance Company of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国吉林省延边朝鲜族自治州下辖的县级市。
description.en: A county-level city under the jurisdiction of Yanbian Korean Autonomous Prefecture, Jilin Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省级行政区。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于亚洲的社会主义国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一家大型国有保险公司。
description.en: A large state-owned insurance company in the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第八届全国委员会的成员。
description.en: Member of the 8th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.
Li Yumin is from Dunhua, Jilin.

description.zh-cn: 敦化市是吉林省下辖的县级市。
description.en: Dunhua is a county-level city under the jurisdiction of Jilin Province.

description.zh-cn: 李裕民曾任中国人民保险公司董事长兼总经理。
description.en: Li Yumin served as the Chairman and General Manager of the People's Insurance Company of China.

description.zh-cn: 李裕民是第八届全国政协委员。
description.en: Li Yumin was a member of the 8th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类，李裕民是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the page categories, Li Yumin is a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 李裕民是中华人民共和国的政治人物。
description.en: Li Yumin is a political figure of the People's Republic of China.
